paragraph: Joseph Gabriel Esther Maneri (February 9, 1927 â€“ August 24, 2009), was an American jazz composer, saxophone and clarinet player. Violinist Mat Maneri is his son.
The Boston Microtonal Society is dedicated to microtonal music and tuning.
